```{r}
              # Install & load dplyr package
library("dplyr")
library(MASS)
library ('glmnet')

```


```{r}
Cancer <- read.csv('/Users/hazemeseifan/ASML/cancer_reg.csv')
Cancer
```







```{r}
summary (Cancer)
```


```{r}
Cancer_m1 =  na.omit(Cancer [,-c(9, 13, 17,24)])
Cancer_m1
```


```{r}
M1 = lm (target_deathrate ~., data= Cancer_m1)
summary (M1)
```

```{r}
plot (M1)
```

```{r}
Cancer_m2= na.omit (Cancer [, -c(9, 13, 17,24)])

Cancer_m2
```





```{r}
M2= lm (target_deathrate ~., data= Cancer_m2)
summary (M2)
plot (M2)
```


```{r}
Rs = rstudent(M2)
Rsc = rstudent(M2)
Rst =rstandard(M2)
plot (M2$fitted.values, Rs)
```
```{r}
ks.test (Rst, 'pnorm')
ks.test (Rsc, 'pt', nrow (Cancer_m2)-ncol(Cancer_m2))

```

```{r}
Fore_M2= stepAIC (M2, test= 'F', direction = 'both')

```

```{r}
M3 = lm (target_deathrate ~ avganncount + avgdeathsperyear + incidencerate + 
    popest2015 + medianagemale + medianagefemale + percentmarried + 
    pctnohs18_24 + pcths18_24 + pcths25_over + pctbachdeg25_over + 
    pctemployed16_over + pctprivatecoverage + pctempprivcoverage + 
    pctpubliccoverage + pctpubliccoveragealone + pctwhite + pctotherrace + 
    pctmarriedhouseholds + birthrate, data= Cancer_m2)
summary (M3)
```


```{r}
plot (M3)
```
```{r}
Rs = rstudent(M3)
Rst =rstandard(M3)
plot (M3$fitted.values, Rs)
```

```{r}
ks.test (Rst, 'pnorm')
```


```{r}
M4= stepAIC (M2, test= 'F', direction= 'both')


```
